paradocks::Grid

paradocks::Grid Class Reference
[ParaDockS Fitness function Interface]

Grid class. This class can be used to aproximate the energie value within a grid by linear triangulation. More...

Detailed Description

Grid class. This class can be used to aproximate the energie value within a grid by linear triangulation.
